Crimes.Crime_Name: Misrepresentation under Immigration and Refugee Protection Act
Crimes.Legal_Issue: Whether the RAD erred in confirming the RPD's credibility findings
Crimes.Procedural_Context: Appeal from RPD decision to RAD, followed by judicial review
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Applicant deemed non-credible due to discrepancies in visa application and testimony
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Discrepancies between visa application and refugee claim
Crimes.Regulation_Cited: IRPA sections on refugee determination and appeal
Crimes.Application_Error: RAD failed to conduct independent analysis of credibility
Crimes.Assessment_Standard: Independent assessment with deference to RPD if justified
Crimes.Evidence_Ignored: Lack of independent evaluation of evidence by RAD
Crimes.Application_Factor: Consistency between statements in different applications
Crimes.Decision_Review_Issue: Failure of RAD to provide a true appeal
Crimes.Governing_Rule_or_Provision: IRPA provisions on appeals and credibility
Crimes.Outcome_of_Review: Redetermination ordered by new RAD panel
Crimes.Cause_of_Refusal: Inconsistent statements leading to credibility concerns
Crimes.Evidentiary_Issues: Discrepancies in applicant’s accounts across proceedings
Crimes.Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Challenge to RAD's failure to independently assess evidence
Crimes.Procedural_Issue: RAD's failure to fulfill statutory duty to reassess

Crimes.Crime_Name: Providing false or misleading information to a visa officer

Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Discrepancies between visa application and refugee claim
Crimes.Regulation_Cited: IRPA sections on refugee determination and appeal
Crimes.Application_Error: RAD relied solely on RPD's findings without independent analysis
Crimes.Assessment_Standard: Independent assessment with deference to RPD if justified
Crimes.Evidence_Ignored: Lack of independent evaluation of evidence by RAD

Crimes.Decision_Review_Issue: Failure of RAD to provide a true appeal

Crimes.Outcome_of_Review: Redetermination ordered by new RAD panel
Crimes.Cause_of_Refusal: Inconsistent statements leading to credibility concerns
Crimes.Evidentiary_Issues: Discrepancies in applicant’s accounts across proceedings
Crimes.Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Challenge to RAD's failure to independently assess evidence
Crimes.Procedural_Issue: RAD's failure to fulfill statutory duty to reassess
